name: Lamball

ability.name: Fluffy Shield
ability.description:
When activated, equips to the player and becomes a shield.
Sometimes drops Wool when assigned to Ranch.

description: A walk up a hill tends to end with this Pal tumbling back down. This causes it to become dizzy and unable to move, making it easy to capture and kill. As a result, this pal has tumbled down to the very bottom of the food chain itself.

skills.name: Roly Poly
skills.description: Lamball's special skill. Curls into a ball, rolling after any enemies in its way. Becomes dizzy and unable to move after the attack ends.

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Power Shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: Implode
skills.description: Risks its life to cause a violent explosion. Becomes incapacitated afterwards.

skills.name: Electric Ball
skills.description: Fires an electric ball that slowly pursues an enemy.

skills.name: Power Bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: Pal Blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
